New Records: Ross Adair scored the third T20I century for Ireland.
Key Match Events: Ross Adair scored a magnificent century.
Paul Stirling and Ross Adair had an opening stand of 137.
Mark Adair took 4 wickets for 31 runs.
Graeme Hume took 3 wickets for 25 runs.
Ireland achieved their first ever T20I victory against South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lungi Ngidi was the most economical bowler for South Africa with figures of 4-0-23-1.
South Africa comfortably won the first match at the same venue by eight wickets.
